data.title: Chris Koch - Consultative Sales Technologies
data.meta_description: I was born in Sri Lanka, the fourth and only male child, and grew up knowing absolutely… · Experience: Consultative Sales Technologies · Education: Monash University · Location: Gold Coast · 500+ connections on LinkedIn. View Chris Koch’s profile on LinkedIn, a professional community of 1 billion members.
data.text:
Do you have difficulty raising your prices for new clients, and telling current clients? Listen in to today’s Episode on The Releasing Negative Emotions for Business Owners Series. Episode #1 Michael gives business owner, Heidi Dunstan, a Releasing Negative Emotions session on a business block – raising her service fees for new clients and telling existing clients new fees. Listen in and see what happens. Find Heidi on LinkedIn: https://lnkd.in/gJhnpSzE The timer is on, and the goal is to complete entire session in under 15-minute. Watch and see Michael's unique ability to identify and release old negative emotions causing this problem. The Business Owner Offer: Curious about having your own Releasing Negative Emotions session to grow your business? https://lnkd.in/gfHSVxcf Check out other Releasing Negative Emotions sessions Michael offers: https://lnkd.in/g6g3JDvC See ALL Episodes to date: https://lnkd.in/guGQ7Vyg #MichaelLosier #BusinessBlocks #MoneyBlocks #ReleasingNegativeEmotions #heartwall #emotioncode #EmotionCodePractitioner #BodyCode #EnergyHealing #EnergyProxy #EnergyHealer #hangoutwithmichael #distancehealing #distancehealer #MoneyBlocks #SuccessBlocks #ReleasingNegativeEmotions

My business makes 90% profit margin. You can too if you do this…. ⬇️ Start an online educational business. . If you are an industry expert, highly skilled in your specialisation or a service based business owner, you can turn your genius into 6,7,8 figures in revenue with minimal overhead’s. . You do not need a fancy office You do not need a marketing department You do not need a finance department You do not need a sales team . I have helped hundreds of experts create world class educational programs - some offer online programs, some create online academies, whilst others deliver high end coaching/consulting. . Either way, educational businesses is the future. . Equity companies are acquiring these type of businesses. . I have 19 years experience building educational programs and I want to help you sell your genius and get you out of 40 hour work weeks. . This is the future. . Schedule a zoom call with me. The link is in the comments below. ⬇️ #onlinebusiness #coursecreator #entrepreneur

Relationship Alchemy How to align money and relationships 6 week Live Online course with Kiki Theo Tuesdays 5pm to 7pm SAST* Starting 11 June 2024 USD $299 via Paypal ZAR 5,500 via EFT How do early childhood experiences around money impact your ability to expand wealth? Are you still carrying around beliefs and attitudes about money making from your mother and father or other ancestors? Who held the money energy in your home? Who was the wealth shrinker? Who was the wealth attractor? Are you holding the right energy at the right time in your business, allowing the flow of yin and yang? Are you re-creating or plugging into old wealth patterns that may not even be your own? Relationship Alchemy will help you transform and release inherited money patterns linked to relationships, so you can take your power back, and increase wealth flow lightly and effortlessly - no matter where you are on the road to wealth. You will also examine money and your relationship to it in terms of masculine and feminine energy with specific emphasis on how this affects money making and correct business flow. Join a group of likeminded entrepreneurs, creatives and business owners for another confidential, life changing wealth expansion journey that will leave you refreshed, rejuvenated and renewed. In this powerful, yet light hearted six week intensive, you will: Process and transform mother, father, child and lover relationships, to: * let go others' limiting beliefs, attitudes and energy * re-align with the correct sequencing of yin and yang energy * activate beneficial flow in relationships and wealth * connect with and re-configure key archetypes to add power * learn unique yet practical tools you can use to expand self and wealth - no matter where you are on the money journey. BOOK NOW! 1. Get application form: kiki@moneyalchemy.com 2. Pay deposit via Paypal or Eft (Full cost or R1000/$50 deposit to secure) 3. Receive your preparation pack for the journey NB: Recordings for missed sessions provided Participant visuals and chat off - confidentiality as always, assured. There is a time to expand and move forward, and a time to yield and contain - knowing when to do which, is the secret to wealth flow. Kiki Theo
